description:
Natsumi`s birthday is coming up, but she claims she doesn`t like presents or parties, which she defines as "too childish."  Desperate to do something to celebrate it, Fuyuki and the Keroro Platoon decides to throw a huge birthday party to surprise her... which might or might not be a huge disaster.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gokuhi! Natsumi no Otanjoubi Daisakusen de Arimasu
The Birthday the Earth Stood Still!
極秘! 夏美のお誕生日大作戦 であります
